title: AnimatedBuilder
introduction: A general-purpose widget for building animations. AnimatedBuilder is useful for more complex widgets that wish to include an animation as part of a larger build function. To use AnimatedBuilder, simply construct the widget and pass it a builder function.

title: AnimatedContainer
introduction: A container that gradually changes its values over a period of time.

title: AnimatedCrossFade
introduction: A widget that cross-fades between two given children and animates itself between their sizes.

title: AnimatedDefaultTextStyle
introduction: Animated version of DefaultTextStyle which automatically transitions the default text style (the text style to apply to descendant Text widgets without explicit style) over a given duration whenever the given style changes.

title: AnimatedListState
introduction: The state for a scrolling container that animates items when they are inserted or removed.

title: AnimatedModalBarrier
introduction: A widget that prevents the user from interacting with widgets behind itself.

title: AnimatedOpacity
introduction: Animated version of Opacity which automatically transitions the child's opacity over a given duration whenever the given opacity changes.

title: AnimatedPhysicalModel
introduction: Animated version of PhysicalModel.

title: AnimatedPositioned
introduction: Animated version of Positioned which automatically transitions the child's position over a given duration whenever the given position changes.

title: AnimatedSize
introduction: Animated widget that automatically transitions its size over a given duration whenever the given child's size changes.

title: AnimatedWidget
introduction: A widget that rebuilds when the given Listenable changes value.

title: AnimatedWidgetBaseState
introduction: A base class for widgets with implicit animations.

title: DecoratedBoxTransition
introduction: Animated version of a DecoratedBox that animates the different properties of its Decoration.

title: FadeTransition
introduction: Animates the opacity of a widget.

title: Hero
introduction: A widget that marks its child as being a candidate for hero animations.

title: PositionedTransition
introduction: Animated version of Positioned which takes a specific Animation to transition the child's position from a start position to and end position over the lifetime of the animation.

title: RotationTransition
introduction: Animates the rotation of a widget.

title: ScaleTransition
introduction: Animates the scale of transformed widget.

title: SizeTransition
introduction: Animates its own size and clips and aligns the child.

title: SlideTransition
introduction: Animates the position of a widget relative to its normal position.
